title.rendered: Search Berg Reviews Win Prestigious SiteJabber Customer  Choice Award 2017!

content.rendered:
The digital marketing company makes it into Sitejabber’s list of top 10 SEO companies.

New York, NY; September 25, 2017: Search Berg, one of the leading SEO companies in the United States, becomes the winner of Sitejabber’s Customer Choice Award. This puts Search Berg into the top 1 percent of the 70,000 businesses reviewed by the online review platform. Over the years, Search Berg has won the trust of thousands of clients across the globe and this award is a concrete testimony to that. The platform, Sitejabber, honors outstanding businesses that demonstrates incredible customer service.

Search Berg is a result-oriented SEO company based in New York. From travel to real-estate, the company has improved Google’s rankings for a wide variety of clients. With a team of creative writers and web SEO experts, Search Berg has firmly established as one of the leading SEO firms in the United States.

Sharing the great news, one of the representatives from the company commented, “This is one of our many milestones and accomplishments, and we’re very proud of it. This makes us one of the top 10 SEO companies. We’re really passionate about online marketing, and understand the incredible power and potential of the platform. Making a mark in the SEO industry has been difficult, but we have enjoyed every bit of our journey. Our team of web SEO experts intends to continue with the same level of commitment.”

The annual Sitejabber Customer Choice Award is presented to the businesses that have provided extraordinary services and have garnered positive reviews. Based on the reviews of more than 100 million of Sitejabber’s visitors across 60 different categories, the winners of the awards make up the top 1 percent of all businesses registered on the reliable online review platform.

The review website takes into account a number of factors including total number of reviews, quality of reviews, business’s response rates and overall star rating . Search Berg, one of the most remarkable digital marketing agencies in the country, wins Sitejabber’s Customer Choice Award for 2017. The award provides testimony to the consistency and commitment that the company has been demonstrating for some time. Making an influence in the harshly competitive organic search landscape is a remarkable achievement for Search Berg.

The representative further added, “Google’s algorithms have changed quite a bit over the years. The search engine has gotten smarter, faster, and knows how to assess website’s value. So, the secret recipe of success in the organic SEO landscape is high-quality, useful content. With writers having expertise in a wide variety of subjects, we have been able to provide relevant, high-quality content to our clients. From compelling blog pieces to creative infographics, our team knows how to help our clients stay on top on Google.”

With a team of seasoned professionals, the SEO Company is experiencing massive growth. With more than 10,000 SEO projects and counting, Search Berg has acquired the status of one of the most trustworthy names in the industry.

You may read Search Berg customer feedbacks on the following review sites;

 

Google Reviews
IMServices Reviewed
Freelancer
LocalSEOReviews
Trustpilot
